artist: Painter: After Adriaen van der Werff; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: portrait bust; turned left looking out at viewer; head tilted to shoulder; in an oval frame on a pedestal with a portrait to left of oval and battle scene to right; after a self portrait
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: ficquet / ADRIEN / VANDER WERF / ELEVE / D\'EGLON VANDER NEER  |  on sheet in pencil: 2-596
title: Adrien Vander Werf
